scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.mobile:build: npm run build:client && npx cap sync
scripts.android:build: npm run build:client && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:run: npm run android:build && npx cap run android
scripts.android:build-apk: npm run android:build && cd android && export JAVA_HOME=${JAVA_HOME:-/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64} && chmod +x gradlew && ./gradlew assembleDebug && echo '✅ APK built successfully at: android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk'
scripts.android:build-apk-release: npm run android:build && cd android && export JAVA_HOME=${JAVA_HOME:-/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64} && chmod +x gradlew && ./gradlew assembleRelease && echo '✅ APK built successfully at: android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk'
scripts.ios:build: npm run build:client && npx cap sync ios
scripts.ios:run: npm run ios:build && npx cap run ios
